alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 11 at 5:20AM AKST until November 13 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SUNDAY TO 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches with locally higher amounts at higher elevations. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lower Kuskokwim Valley. * WHEN...From 3 PM Sunday to 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow accumulations expected from Sleetmute, Sparrevohn, and Stony River east. A brief period of a snow/freezing rain mix is expected near Aniak around noon on Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
